item.title: Venerdì Protetto | March edition
item.description: During the last Venerdì Protetto (held on March 8, 2024), we had to change a little bit the schedule we’d planned. We had to face a new schedule with very strict time constraint. So we decided to… do something new, and try a Code Challenge! But how did we do it? We searched for something already done on the Net, the most suitable for our needs. So we tried the most obvious solution and went for… Advent of Code!
